entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as 'Harry' throughout the passage.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts, mentioned as helping Harry with a burial and being given a drink by Slughorn.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Hagrid's dog, mentioned as coming to sit in Harry's lap after the burial.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts, mentioned as bringing wine and giving drinks to Hagrid and Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend, mentioned as someone who would be upset if she heard about the abuse of house-elves.

relationships.description: Slughorn gave a drink to Hagrid from one of the bottles of wine he had brought.
Slughorn also gave a drink to Harry from another bottle.
